title: Oil Falls, Gold and Silver Gain After Venezuela: Markets Wrap
description: Oil fell and precious metals advanced after the US ousted Venezuela’s president, triggering a fresh flashpoint that may stoke geopolitical tensions and impact the flow of crude from the region.
content: Oil fell and precious metals advanced after the US ousted Venezuela’s president, triggering a fresh flashpoint that may stoke geopolitical tensions and impact the flow of crude from the region.
